summary: In San Francisco, an immigrant widow welcomes the new year with some unhappiness: she's sixty-two now, she wants to make a trip to China to pay last respects to her ancestors, a fortune ... See full summary Â»
cast: Laureen Chew|Kim Chew|Victor Wong|Ida F.O. Chung|Cora Miao|John Nishio|Amy Hill|Keith Choy|Mary Chew|Nora Lee|Joan Chen|Rita Yee|George Woo|Elsa Cruz Pearson|Helen Chew|Jarrett Chew
title: Dim Sum: A Little Bit of Heart
